short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to pin all open tabs or to unpin all pinned tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple chrome extension adding pop-up menu which allows user to pin all open tabs or to unpin all currently pinned tabs with one button click.
